properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the music fades and all is stripped away And I simply come Longing just to bring, something that’s of worth That will bless Your heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ll bring You more than a song For a song in itself Is not what You have required You search much deeper within Through the way things appear You’re looking into my heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’m coming back to the heart of worship And it’s all about You It’s all about You, Jesus I’m sorry, Lord, for the things I’ve made it When it’s all about You It’s all about You, Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}King of endless worth, no one could express How much You deserve Though I’m weak and poor, all I have is Yours Every single breath{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ll bring You more than a song For a song in itself Is not what You have required You search much deeper within Through the way things appear You’re looking into my heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’m coming back to the heart of worship And it’s all about You It’s all about You, Jesus I’m sorry, Lord, for the things I’ve made it When it’s all about You It’s all about You, Jesus{/lang-eng}
